user_query: I'm a software engineer and I'm looking for some programming humor to brighten up my day. Can you fetch me the latest programming memes and provide me with a list of Reddit comments discussing programming challenges?

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest programming memes from a meme API.
Search Reddit for the most recent comments on programming challenges.
Combine and format the fetched memes and Reddit comments into a single list for the user.
